citations.narrative:
The business recently closed it's retail pet store and did not notify Animal Care at least 90 days in advance. A major
change in address, such as shutting down a retail store and moving animals to a different location, requires notifying
Animal Care so the new site can be inspected and the account updated to reflect the change in address. Having the
appropriate site address is important for animals to be available for inspection and to track the movement of animals.
Correct by 31 July 2023 by ensuring that a new license is obtained for use at the new location prior to conducting
regulated activity. According to the facility, no regulated species have been sold in over a year and the business is no
longer planning on housing USDA regulated species.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
No regulated animals were present at the time of inspection.
